text: (nabiye!) obage sihinen allah (gananayen) ovunva adu kara penvimada, oba sita balanu. ovunva (gananayen) adhika kara, obata penva tibune nam oba dhairyaya bindi, yuddha kirima gæna oba tula tarka karamin sitinnehuya. ehet allah (obava) araksa kara gatteya. niyata vasayenma ohu hrdayanhi æti dæya hondin danneki
